Rank.Description: Increases your Maximum Mana by 2%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 1 meter. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Pyromancer's Ignition.
Increases your Maximum Mana by 4%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 2 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Pyromancer's Ignition.
Increases your Maximum Mana by 6%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 3 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Pyromancer's Ignition.
Increases your Maximum Mana by 8%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 4 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Pyromancer's Ignition.
Increases your Maximum Mana by 10%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 5 meters. Increased range does not stack with the range increase from the Pyromancer's Ignition.
Reduces the cast time of your next spell by 0.25 seconds after casting a control or movement impairing spell. This is not triggered by snare abilities or effects.
Reduces the cast time of your next spell by 0.5 seconds after casting a control or movement impairing spell. This is not triggered by snare abilities or effects.
Increases the base damage attackers take from your Mass Charged Shield by 25%.
Increases the base damage attackers take from your Mass Charged Shield by 50%.
Increases your Intelligence by 2%.
Increases your Intelligence by 4%.
Increases your Intelligence by 6%.
Increases your Intelligence by 8%.
Increases your Intelligence by 10%.

Ability.Description: Grants a 60% chance to be Interrupted and Silenced for 3s whenever the enemy uses a beneficial ability. Can occur up to 5 times.

Rank.Description: Priest's Lament
Reduces the cooldown of Reflective Command by 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Reflective Command by 4 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Reflective Command by 6 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Reflective Command by 8 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Reflective Command by 10 seconds.
Allows your Storm Shackle to trigger an additional time and increases its duration by 2 seconds.
Allows your Storm Shackle to trigger an additional 2 times and increases its duration by 4 seconds.

Ability.Description: Applies Arresting Presence to the target, Silencing all nearby enemies. Consumes Charge while active.

Rank.Description: Arresting Presence
After successfully controlling an enemy, using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your casting speed is increased by 10% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy, using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your casting speed is increased by 20% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy, using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your casting speed is increased by 30% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy, using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your casting speed is increased by 40% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy, using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your casting speed is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

Ability.Description: Deals 881 Death damage. Drains charge, mana, energy, and power. Reduces mana, energy, and power regeneration by 25%. Increases ability cost by 50%. Lasts 7s.

Rank.Description: Transference
Increases the duration of your Transmogrify ability by 2 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 5 seconds.
Increases the duration of your Transmogrify ability by 4 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 10 seconds.
Increases the duration of your Transmogrify ability by 6 seconds and reduces the cooldown by 15 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your spell power is increased by 4% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your spell power is increased by 8% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your spell power is increased by 12% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your spell power is increased by 16% for 5 seconds.
After successfully controlling an enemy using Transmogrify, Mass Exhaustion or Death's Edict, your spell power is increased by 20% for 5 seconds.

Increases the damage of your Mana Wrench by 3%, the mana returned and drained per second by an additional 0.5% of your maximum mana,the energy drained per second by 1 and reduces the cooldown on Mana Wrench by 5 seconds.

Increases the damage of your Mana Wrench by 6%, the mana returned and drained per second by an additional 1% of your maximum mana,the energy drained per second by 2 and reduces the cooldown on Mana Wrench by 10 seconds.

Increases the damage of your Mana Wrench by 10%, the mana returned and drained per second by an additional 1.5% of your maximum mana,the energy drained per second by 3 and reduces the cooldown on Mana Wrench by 15 seconds.

Ability.Description: Applies Reflective Presence to all party or raid members within 35 meters, reflecting the next hostile spell cast on them within 10s. Consumes 50 Charge when cast.

Rank.Description: Reflective Presence

Ability.Description: Transforms the Mage into a shade. Summons 3 matching shades that each deal 528 to 584 Death damage. Lasts 20s.

Rank.Description: Split Personality
Reduces the cast time of Split Personality by 50% and reduces its cooldown by 30 seconds.
Reduces the cast time of Split Personality by 100% and reduces its cooldown by 1 minute.
Reduces the global cooldown of your non-damaging abilities to 1.25 seconds and reduces their mana cost by 16%.
Reduces the global cooldown of your non-damaging abilities to 1 second and reduces their mana cost by 33%.

Ability.Description: Applies Traitorous Influence for 15s or until triggered 5 times. Causes damaging and healing abilities used by each to deal 716 Death damage to up to 6 enemies. Damaged enemies also lose mana, energy, and power.

Rank.Description: Traitorous Influence
Reduces the cast time of your Transmogrify to 0.

Causes your Transmogrify and Mass Exhaustion effectsto break after the enemy receives damage equal to 1.5% of your maximum Health, plus 0.15% of your maximum Health for each point spent in the Dominator soul. This only occurs with enemies above 85% Health.

Causes your Transmogrify and Mass Exhaustion effects to break after the enemy receives damage equal to 3% of your maximum Health, plus 0.3% of your maximum Health for each point spent in the Dominator soul. This only occurs with enemies above 85% Health.
Increases the duration of your Split Personality by 5 seconds.
Increases the duration of your Split Personality by 10 seconds.
Increases the number of stacks applied by Haunting Pain by 1.
Increases the number of stacks applied by Haunting Pain by 2.
Increases the number of stacks applied by Haunting Pain by 3.
Increases the damage of your Dominator abilities by 10%.
Increases the damage of your Dominator abilities by 20%.

Ability.Description: Absorbs 50% of healing done to the enemy, up to a total of 1040 health over 10s.

Rank.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Storm Shackle and Mass Exhaustion by 50% and their mana cost by 12%.
Reduces the casting time of your Storm Shackle and Mass Exhaustion by 100% and their mana cost by 25%.
